name: Rotating Aim
description:
Rotating Aim is a game made in pygame, for Kenney Jam 2021.

You can control horizontal movement of player with Arrow keys and A/D keys.

Press Space Key when direction arrow is having appropriate direction, and player will move in that direction.

Your Goal is to reach The Star at top corner.

All Game Art in this Project is by Kenney.

Sound effects are made by me.

All programming work is by me (Solo Developer).
